about.paragraph: We are the best option that you will have in the palm of your hand for those dangerous moments or those of possible threat, in which you need to alert the entire community and let them know that you are in potential danger and with this manage to persuade the possible aggression or attack.
why: Protection for your family and/or your business
The best security option for your pocket

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.paragraph: Know the interface of the Application

items.title: Log In
items.text: Once you have created your account and activated the app's location permissions, you can access it by selecting the corresponding country and entering the registered number.

items.title: Verification code
items.text: When you enter the app for the first time you will receive a verification message to the registered number which you must type.

items.title: Map
items.text: Within the app you can see a map with the exact location in real time, at the bottom you can see the panic button, which once it has been pressed will generate a danger alert in the location of the registered store.

items.title: Panic
items.text: When a panic report has been generated, all the people who have the app and are within the georeferencing radius will be automatically alerted.

items.title: Menu
items.text: There is also a navigation menu in which different modules can be viewed to which we can have access (the register user and manage user sections will only be visible to the administrator).

items.title: Profile
items.text: Here you can see and edit all the information related to you.

items.title: Add User
items.text: We manage a user registry through a QR code which redirects to the application and in this the worker must complete the individual registration process.

items.title: Manage Users
items.text: You will be able to visualize the registered users to our store, which are our collaborators.

items.title: Delete user
items.text: If by mistake or for any reason we want to delete a user that we had added, we can do it, however we will show you a warning message to be sure of your decision ;)

items.title: Generate QR
items.text: From the same section of managing users we can generate the QR code to add a new one, simple! Do not you believe it?

services.meetOurServices: Learn about the available services we offer

items.name: Easy to handle
items.text: Mobile application that allows you to activate panic and alert the community.

items.name: Internet of Things
items.text: Wireless panic button with which you can activate the panic of the mobile application without the need to use your mobile phone.

items.name: Continuous support
items.text: System availability 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

bikeAlert.title: BikeAlert
bikeAlert.paragraph1: BikeAlert is the new functionality of BodegAlert designed to support and improve the security of deliveries, through the use of our technological platform available in the best mobile application stores.
bikeAlert.paragraph2: The operation is the same, regardless of whether you register as a winery or as a delivery. (If you want to explore the procedure for using our app, head over to the gallery section)
